countries.name: Kenya
countries.details: known for having many of the worlds best runners.Swahili and English are the official languages.has a population of 55.34 million.current president in office is H.E William Ruto

countries.name: Japan
countries.details: one of the most technologically advanced countries.Japanese its the official language.Has a population of 124.5 million.Receives one of the highest amount of snowfall in the world.

countries.name: France
countries.details: is the most visited country in the world for it has good sceneries.has a a population of 68.29 million .France is the largest country in Europe.Its a global center of art,science and philosophy.

countries.name: Brazil
countries.details: it is known for its natural wonders.The largest country in South America.Has a population of over 212 million.Portuguese is the official and national language.Famous for its rainforest and lively city life.

countries.name: Canada
countries.details: it has the longest coastline in the world.Has a population of 40.1 million.English and French are the languages spoken in Canada.Mark Carney is the 24th prime minister.was officially called Dominion Of Canada.

countries.name: Australia
countries.details: the only place where kangaroos exist.Has a population of 26.66 million.Mandarin is the second most spoken language while English is the widely spoken language.Sydney is the most largest city

countries.name: Egypt
countries.details: famous for having many pyramids.Has a population of 114.5 million.Arabic its the official language.its a lower middle-income country with moderate food security.Abdel Fattah is the current president.
